title: The Jan. 6 Committee Hearings: The Big Picture
sub_head: Your guide through the evidence and what to expect as the congressional investigation holds its public questioning on Trump and the Capitol riots.
body: The Jan.6 committee is investigating what some are calling an insurrection at the U.S. Capitol in a series of televised hearings. The Opinion pages of The Wall Street Journal look at the events, evidence, and the impact on the political landscape in America.
